mapper.select: select ci.car_info_id, info.model_name, info.manufacture_year, info.mileage, info.transmission, info.car_price, info.fuel_type from car_information ci left join information info on ci.car_info_id = info.car_info_id where ci.is_deleted=false and info.is_deleted=false

SELECT ci.car_info_id, info.model_name, ci.description, info.manufacture_year, info.mileage, info.transmission, info.car_price, info.fuel_type, info.color, info.previous_registration_fee AS previousRegistrationFee, info.maintenance_cost AS maintenanceCost, info.agency_fee AS agencyFee, info.car_location AS carLocation, info.owner_change_count AS ownerChangeCount, info.car_price AS carPrice, info.car_num AS carNum, info.car_amount_price AS carAmountPrice, info.engine_capacity AS engineCapacity FROM car_information ci LEFT JOIN information info ON ci.car_info_id = info.car_info_id WHERE ci.is_deleted = false AND info.is_deleted = false AND ci.car_info_id = #{carInfoId}
